title: Roostels India to open 15 themed hotels across India in FY 23-24
description: “Hospitality industry is witnessing a strong uptick post-COVID. With Roadies Rostel, we are offering one of its kind holiday experience in India. All our resorts, including the one in Ahmedabad, are creatively designed to suit the needs of the new-age millennial traveller and fulfil their quest for thrill and adventure,” said Aditya Kushwaha, Chairman and Founder, Roostels India.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
